Package tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Model.Obstacle

Class ExplosiveObstacle

java.lang.Object
tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Model.Obstacle.Obstacle
tr.edu.ku.devnull.needforspear.Model.Obstacle.ExplosiveObstacle
public class ExplosiveObstacle
extends Obstacle
ExplosiveObstacle is a class that extends Obstacle which contains the attributes of an explosive obstacle.

Explosive obstacles fall down after being destroyed, potentially damaging the player.
